category-def.name: qvto
category-def.label: QVT Operational
category-def.description: QVT Operational SDK (interpreter with support for BlackBox libraries, editor with JDT integration, debugger, metamodel browser, Ant support) and QVTo Tooling (Code coverage with JUnit integration support)

category-def.name: qvto.tests
category-def.label: QVT Operational (tests)
category-def.description: QVT Operational tests and examples source plugins
